name: 1/100 Hero David Crypto Heroes Gold Series by SOLLOG and Crypto Gods Studio for Tezos
description:
1/100 Hero David Crypto Heroes Gold Series by SOLLOG and Crypto Gods Studio for Tezos

Rare NFT Series of the 12 Crypto Heroes in Gold for Tezos only 100 of each Crypto Hero Gold on Tezos will be minted

Crypto Heroes (CryptoHeroes.app ) was designed by SOLLOG and his studio Crypto Gods .app, SOLLOG is a listed Artist in Museums see SOLLOG.com

SOLLOG is the first Artist to sell a $1 Billion work of art see 247News net

Only 100 of this NFT will be minted 
Only 1200 Crypto Heroes will be minted on Tezos, making it one of the rarest major releases of any NFT Brand

10% will be given away FREE
50% will be drip released at discount rates from 10 XTZ to 100K XTZ 
40% of the Distribution will be listed at 1 Million XTZ 
Follow SOLLOG on Twitter to get alerts for FREE & Reduced Tokens being released

This is a 10 FOLD Distribution Release which means as the tokens are distributed, each level 10 FOLDS in Value, it takes only 7 Levels to reach 1 MILLION TEZOS per token. Get in early since the series will increase in value exponentially as it is released.

01-10 – FREE Random Winner chosen who RT, Tags and Follows @sollog on Twitter
11-20 – 10 Tezos via MAKE OFFER on OBJKT.com
21-30 – 100 Tezos via MAKE OFFER on OBJKT.com
31-40 – 1,000 Tezos via MAKE OFFER on OBJKT.com 
41-50 – 10,000 Tezos via MAKE OFFER on OBJKT.com
51-60 – 100,000 Tezos via MAKE OFFER on OBJKT.com
61-100– 1,000,000 Tezos via MAKE OFFER on OBJKT.com

The copies of this NFT Project will be distributed through a MAKE OFFER system on OBJKT.com, 1 Copy will be available at a time via MAKE OFFER, when that level of value is reached, a 24 Hour Trigger will be in effect that results in the winning bidder being higher that that level that triggered the 24 hour countdown. 

Example MAKE OFFER is in effect on Level 2, when MAKE OFFER reaches 10 Tezos, the public has 24 hours to better the offer that triggered the 24 Hour countdown. The winner of that level will be the highest MAKE OFFER BID 24 hours after the level was reached


SOLLOG is a listed artist in museums and the first artist to have a $1 Billion Sale
